title: Severe weather causes power outages in the Tennessee Valley Wednesday night | Must See Videos | local3news.com
text: [] Severe weather causes power outages in the Tennessee Valley Wednesday night - - Updated The severe weather moving through the Tennessee Valley on Wednesday night and Thursday morning has left some people without power. As featured on Crews have been working nonstop throughout the night and into the morning, by noon central time the outages were down to under 500 outages.
